reference_solution_cpp: while(true) { if (front_distance_sensor.get_distance() < 3) { all_leds.set_color(RED); } else if (front_distance_sensor.get_distance() < 6) { all_leds.set_color(GREEN); } else { all_leds.set_color(OFF); } }
